entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Fixed buffer size expression has no symbol info #75113
    Backlog
  • Add an option to apply code formatting to collection initializers #8269
    17.6 P3
  • If class has primary constructor, cannot provide XML documentation comment for class #75272
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • Revert "Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding (#64928)" #75406
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix null encoding in new document in move type action #74623
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Improve performance on `SymbolCompletionProviderTests` #75496
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
